body.name: Makeup Mirror with Lights,Vanity Mirror with Lights,Tabletop Mirror with Detachable 15X Magnification 3 Color Modes and Smart Touch Control.Phone Holder, 360 Rotation,Metal Frame,White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 31 mins
features: 【3 Colors Lighting & High Quality 】Makeup mirror has 3 colors lighting modes. Short press to "M" to change the light color: warm color/ natural color/ cool color.
【Ajustable Brightness】Short press to Power to turn on/off the light. The Tabletop makeup mirror can be brightened or dimmed to meet your needs. Long press to "P" to adjust the brightness.
【Phone Holder】There is a phone holder directly under the makeup mirror, which is convenient for you to put your phone when you make up.

【Detachable 15X Magnifier】Lighted mirror with 15X magnification helping you to see every detail clearly and apply delicate makeup. Viewing distance is approximately within 2.5-3.2 inches to avoid dizziness and distortion.

【Environmental Friendly Mirror】This makeup mirror is made of environmental friendly mirror, which is a high-transmittance glass. This glass is not easy to rust, and much clearer than ordinary mirrors.
【Suitable Size】lighted mirror for makeup is 11.8"L x 9.8"W, which allows you to get your entire face in view. You can put it on you dressing table and doesn't take up much space.
【Perfect Gift for friends/lovers/family】makeup mirror is a good gift's choice for makeup lovers. And also can be widely used in home/beauty salon/dressing room.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Luxevue Led Lighted Makeup Mirror The New Upgrade！ 12V 1A AC adapter The AC adapter is safer and longer lifecycle than other ordinary adapters. The power is stable to ensure that the light does not flicker and does not hurt the eyes. Metal Frame and Durable Led Light The light up makeup mirror has a built-in energy-saving LED strip light, has 3 dimmable lighting modes. The LED light is eye-friendly and can last for 30,000 hours lifespan.

Detachable 15X Magnification Compare to 10X magnification, we use the 15X magnificer. It has more powerful magnification, for cleaning pores, blackheads, and other more detailed skin care. Tips: Viewing distance is approximately within 2.5-3.2 inches to avoid dizziness and distortion. 360° Rotation Find the perfect angle for makeup with a 360-degree rotation mirror. You can adjust the mirror to any angle you need. Phone Holder Hollywood makeup mirror with phone holder, convenient for watching videos or making a video call with family on your phone while doing makeup. Anti-Slip Mat The bottom of the led Hollywood vanity mirror has a non-slip pad, allowing the vanity mirror to be placed safely and stably on your vanity table, while making no noise when moved.

3 Color Lighting Modes Cold Light/Natural Light/Warm Light The Left：Short touch “M” to change the lighting color The Middle：Short touch to turn the power ON/OFF The Right：Long press to "P" to adjust the brightness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars the design of this mirror is so sleek and beautiful.
reviews.reviewText: It has a Hollywood-inspired feel with the 12 dimmable LED bulbs surrounding the mirror. The bulbs provide the perfect amount of lighting and can be adjusted to your desired brightness level. I love that I can dim the lights when I want a more natural look or turn them up when I need to see more clearly.Another great feature of this mirror is the 3 color lighting modes. It has a cool white light, warm white light, and a natural light option. This is great because it allows me to see how my makeup will look in different lighting settings, whether it be outdoor, indoor, or a night out. I also love that I can easily switch between the lighting modes with just a touch of a button.The touch control design is another aspect that I really appreciate. It is so easy to use and navigate through the different settings. I can easily adjust the brightness level, switch between the lighting modes, and power the mirror on and off with just a touch. The touch buttons are also conveniently placed on the bottom of the mirror, so they're not in the way while I'm doing my makeup.The 360° rotation feature is also a big plus for me. It allows me to easily adjust the mirror to any angle that I need. Whether I'm sitting or standing, I can always position the mirror to get the perfect view of my face. This is especially helpful when doing tasks like applying eyeliner or mascara, where precision is key.Lastly, I love that this mirror can be used either tabletop or wall-mounted. The base of the mirror is sturdy and secure, so I have no worries about it tipping over. However, if I ever decide to mount it on the wall, it comes with all the necessary hardware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really beautiful vanity. Works great. Easy to setup. Quick shipment. Good price. Good deal.
